attributes.action: Cancel Summer parliamentary recess until a decision is made over BREXIT.
attributes.additional_details:
The country is in turmoil, I believe our country is more important than a holiday in the Algarve.
MPs should make our country a priority and debate Brexit until they all come to a decision.
attributes.background:
I believe the planned parliamentary recess from 30th June until 1st September should be cancelled to give our government more time to come to a decision over Brexit.
Our country is increasingly worried about the outcome, so I believe all summer recess should be cancelled until a decision is made.
